name: Piplup
description: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.effect: When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages.  If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.
abilities.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
